website_summaries.verdict: Many experienced bow hunters praise Field Logic's "IQ" system  for its instant correction. The retina lock adds another level of accuracy, but can be fidgety at times.
pros: IQ sighting system provides corrective feedback
Does not require tools for installation or adjustments
cons: Heavier than others on our shortlist
Pins are not color coded for distances
Retina lock difficult to dial in

customer_reviews.title: Allows your bow to sport a green dong
customer_reviews.text: The previous model was a great sight, bought this "updated" sight to complement a new Mathews Vertix. Upon unboxing, the sight is great and pins are super bright. The drawback is that now the engineers pulled a funny one and have a monster green dong on top of the sight. I'm not a guy that looks at something and says " hey that looks like a dong" it's 100% on purpose by IQ there is not explanation for it, and there is no reason for that design pattern to be there. I'm not sure if the sight is only going to allow me to see gay deer with IQs updated dick vision but time will tell. Will keep you posted
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Cruice

customer_reviews.title: More Gimmick than technology
customer_reviews.text: The Retina Lock Technology is more gimmick than anything else. I cannot get the dot to center as the adjustments are too coarse. The sight is OK but it noisy on shot which is the reason for two stars. Nothing is loose it just resonates with the shot. I'll probably find some butyl backed rubber, like what is used in auto sound deadening, to attach to the sight. One positive is that the mounting bracket is reversible which allows for greater range on vertical adjustments. The bracket is curved so that reversing its position changes the height of the sight.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good sight
customer_reviews.text: First off, the top green piece that collects light into the sight is shaped just like a green dong. When you see the other reviewer that included a picture of the top it suspiciously appears suspect. I guess that shape collects light the best? I believe the sight light should be included. Makes one purchase easier instead of buying the sight then buying the light separately. Aluminum sight is a little heavy but just balance the bow and it's not that noticeable. Adjustments are crisp and an allen wrench is necessary to make sure your adjustments stay put. My setup is 20, 30, 40, 50 and 60 yard pin distance.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good looks, poor function
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to shoot this sight after seeing many people have good luck with it. Was easy to install like all bow sights, really like the pins and ease of adjustment with the micro adjustments. With that said, after sighting in at 20 yds, I could not align the "dot" with the provided allen wrench. No matter what I did, up or down, side to side, I couldn't get it perfectly to align with the dot which meant I was adjusting to the dot which would allow for eratic shots. Without using the "eye" I was shooting great just focusing on the level. Unfortunately I returned it and just went with a traditional sight with a bubble level.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Took awhile to adjust to but have seen significant improvement in consistent 1 inch groupings at 20, 30 and 40 yards. Would highly recommend for beginners as well as experienced archers. I have been an avid archer and bowhunter for over 45 years and thought I was pretty good. This sight eliminated the stray arrow and gives me consistent groupings of 1 inch or less each time I shoot.
customer_reviews.author: GAFRO

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it was to set up it made my shots line up better I can see the pins clearly and they are bright, I however didn't like adjusting the sight left or right the knob was hard to turn and the clicks were not smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Chaodyn

customer_reviews.title: I'm A Believer
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth bow site I have purchase in over 35 years of bow hunting. At first, I was skeptical of it because the set up seemed complicated, but I just completed my second hunting season with it and I love it. Its design allows me to sight in both my X and Y axis which gives me some really accurate and tight groups.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Your shooting will improve
customer_reviews.text: Once you got this sight all set up and shooting properly, it's like no other. The technology used in this sight will improve your shooting, especially at longer distances. My wife, son and I all have a version of this sight. I would recommend this sight to anyone. It will improve your shooting, regardless of you're experience
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Aim, shoot, repeat accurately
customer_reviews.text: The tech works once you set it up and you repeat very well. This sight does great to keep you repeating your alignment, the fine precision of adjustment for the sight really lets you dial in.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Pins are kind of dark.
customer_reviews.text: The retina site is very cool, but the damn pins are so small. They really don't seem brighter than the cheap sight that came with my bear cruzer.
customer_reviews.author: Killian Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: Great idea poor build quality: useless
customer_reviews.text: First one arrives with a drained level... reaches out directly to IQ and they weren’t accepting RMA’s (understandable). Exchanged through amazon and got a new one. Love the concept but beware the build quality. Mine cracked from hand frightening....
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Retnia-lock is great
customer_reviews.text: So far after just receiving the sight, it took me a solid forty-five minutes to get accurately shooting from my Diamond Provider by Bowtech. The Retnia-lock feature was a pita to set up, but once it's set allows you to knock out the most consistent of groupings. The solid construction of it is really nice. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great Sight
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and zeroed very quickly. I’ve really enjoyed shooting this sight. The iq level has been pretty useful with keeping the same sight picture every shot.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Williams

customer_reviews.title: The original one I purchased is still perfect. I put these on all of my bows
customer_reviews.text: Second one I have bought. The original one I purchased is still perfect. I put these on all of my bows. It's a fantastic sight and they stand behind their warranty. I broke the other one when I dropped my bow from 20 feet up and they replaced the mounting bracket free and shipped the new one quickly.
customer_reviews.author: DHB

customer_reviews.title: Must have for new and experienced archers.
customer_reviews.text: By far the best sight on the market. The IQ is the best thing for new shooters. Takes a lot of guess work out of why your missing.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Rondeau

customer_reviews.title: Really does work. Not just gimmicky.
customer_reviews.text: Great sight! Admittedly I don't have a ton of experience, I have only been using a bow for one season but this product works as advertised. I love it. Has honestly tightened my groups. I never realized I was putting torque on my handle do often and in varying amounts. Really a great sight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hunting site
customer_reviews.text: Love the retina lock. Perfect at last lite when you are unsure about your peep alighnment. You see the black dot centered and you can be confident you're in correct position.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: accuracy
customer_reviews.text: Takes more time to set up but worth it in accuracy when your done.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Halstead

customer_reviews.title: New style thicker pins
customer_reviews.text: Item was just as described. Be advised these have the new style pin housings, and are thicker around the fiber optic then the old style.
customer_reviews.author: Yodermite

customer_reviews.title: Torque wrenches are key
customer_reviews.text: Bought this used so I cant be too harsh. I really liked the sight. But the previous owner had a habit of tightening this down way too much. Every thread on this thing was damaged
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé fell back in love with me when I presented him this gift lol.
customer_reviews.author: Tara R

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your time with other sights
customer_reviews.text: Best sight I've ever used, I've been bow shooting for over 10yrs now and have tried all different types and brands. This sight is by far the best all around sight I have ever used
customer_reviews.author: Andrew T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed, from my apex sight to this. I am more accurate and the micro adjustments are a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: I really like this sight
customer_reviews.text: I really like this sight, its much easier to see the pins than with my old sight. Being left handed I don't have as many option, so I was glad to see this one was pretty high quality. This sight can help to improve any ones skills, take your time and pay attention to the level.
customer_reviews.author: linuxman84`

customer_reviews.title: Sights/ arrow/ and release are the top 3 things to upgrade. Fyi
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to tune up. It was a major upgrade for my bow. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine R.

customer_reviews.title: Damage bow sight
customer_reviews.text: I received this item but did not use it right away. I just was able to install this new sight on my new Mathews bow There is a crack on the top plastic on the sight I’m hoping that you would be able to help me with this or replace it. Looking forward to hearing from you soon. Thank you for your time
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece, elevation and windage adjustment is nice and easy to read/adjust.
customer_reviews.author: D. McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Great sights just wish a light would come with it
customer_reviews.author: Keith sibley

customer_reviews.title: I liked this so much
customer_reviews.text: I liked this so much, I ordered another one automatically when ordering a second bow. As far as I'm concerned this is standard equipment. You get what you pay for in this life and this is no exception.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Pillera

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sight!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 3 pin and added the light. This is an awesome sight, I thought maybe the retina lock would be gimmicky but it definitely worked. Shooting dead center every shot now! My bow is a red and black scheme so I took the green stickers off, looks good all black.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Significantly improved my aim
customer_reviews.text: And will improve more once I get stable enough to use the retina lock right
customer_reviews.author: Area Man

customer_reviews.title: Not Your Typical Bow Sight
customer_reviews.text: this is good bow sight. the floating dot really helps tighten up the grouping. very glad i bought it.
customer_reviews.author: JRC2

customer_reviews.title: I know some people think it's a gimmick, but ...
customer_reviews.text: I know some people think it's a gimmick, but it does really work, especially if you have a tendency to torque your bow. You will find out if you do.
customer_reviews.author: Racer72

customer_reviews.title: Tightens Shot Groups
customer_reviews.text: The retina lock is very helpful in eliminating torque and significantly tightened my groups at 40 yards and beyond just as advertised. The tool free micro adjust is convenient and quick. The smaller pins are a little hard to see compared to some other sights I've used. Overall I'm very pleased with the quality and functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Txmountainman

customer_reviews.title: Really does help like advertised
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sight! Once you get the retina lock adjusted to your form it really helps you keep consistent form.
customer_reviews.author: JUSTIN

customer_reviews.title: Killer sight!
customer_reviews.text: Great pin separation and I love the IQ tech to minimize torque. Improved shot consistency and confidence greatly. Have my pins at 20-60 yd at 10 yd increments
customer_reviews.author: ethan mey

customer_reviews.title: Retina lock works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this sight, the retina lock is a huge essential in shooting tighter groups.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Breuklander

customer_reviews.title: Good product but noise and vibration issues
customer_reviews.text: Great sight but windage adjustment knobs cause quite a bit of vibration and noise, once removed the sight is perfect for someone who is not wanting to use the windage feature
customer_reviews.author: stuart hanon

customer_reviews.title: The retina lock is key for a novice like me, without it i was all over the ...
customer_reviews.text: I put this sight on my very first bow, a Hoyt razortec, it took a little over an hour to sight it in and get the retina lock where i wanted it. This sight has made a world of difference, im hitting lungs and heart consistently on my target all the way out to 60 yards. The retina lock is key for a novice like me, without it i was all over the place. This is a great quality product.
customer_reviews.author: patrick griffiths

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sight. Really helps with knowing if bow is torqued
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: great sight and pretty easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Definitely lives up to the hype, I’d buy another in a heartbeat. Only complaint is that I had to max it out on the elevation to sight my 20 yard pin in. Otherwise, great sight and pretty easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: product exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: just what i ordered and with timely delivery. product is a step up from earlier sights I.ve used. I think it will help me shoot better.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L. Roush

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sight. Definately helps with accuracy. Well worth the money. Not a gimic!
customer_reviews.author: Sheephead

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband for his new bow and he loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Alisa Pitts

customer_reviews.title: Sick sight, definitely buy light to go with it ...
customer_reviews.text: Sick sight, definitely buy light to go with it. Strong aluminum no cheap plastic here. Retina lock helps you achieve consistent anchor points with every draw, which leads to tighter groups.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bow sight
customer_reviews.text: Spectacular sight. ..Once it was sighted in couldn't miss. On target shot after shot.if your looking for an awesome sight look no further
customer_reviews.author: Jesse G.

customer_reviews.title: Retina lock helps with anchor consistency
customer_reviews.text: As a new archer the retina lock helps me recognize when my anchor points are not consistent. Have mostly shot close range so far so can not speak to accuracy benefits beyond that.
customer_reviews.author: David Truss

customer_reviews.title: Great Sight!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sight, well made, very bright pins, easy adjustments and the retina lock really does help form and improves accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I belong to a archery leaque and it has helped me with my score
customer_reviews.author: William J.

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: Put it on, sighted it in, killed a buck. Works very well.
customer_reviews.author: John Q

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Completely awesome sight. Works perfectly and was super easy to install and sight in. It is incredibly easy to adjust and fit to myself.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Increased my accuracy, but made a buzzing sound when I shot until I preloaded the adjustment screws.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy R Baker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sight!!!
customer_reviews.text: Follow the instructions! After getting this sight dialed in and getting the retina lock adjusted to my eye my groups shrank significantly. Works as advertised. very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: rosie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect. Easy to install and to adjust the pin sights.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Arceneaux

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Greatly improved my groupings. I'm now putting three arrows in an area the size of a quarter at 20 and 30 yards
customer_reviews.author: hypoboa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worth it!!!!! Definitely helps you know if you are putting torque in the riser
customer_reviews.author: Matt Bell

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Very easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very easy to setup. I do recommend the optional light. Makes low light hunting a blessing. Definitely helped tighten up my groups.
customer_reviews.author: sean mccarthy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This site is awesome very easy to see in low light imo the best on the market
customer_reviews.author: Joe D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Has improved my shooting once it was sighted in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Once you find out how to sight in the dot it's real easy to sight in the pins and be accurate everytime you shoot
customer_reviews.author: Cole VerBruggen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sight.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sight. I was leary of the retina lock but it is a very nice feature, definitely helped me shoot further and more accurately. Sight built very sturdy and is really high quality. The pins are very bright even in low light. Great sight, worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: dr

customer_reviews.title: Distracting
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy sight, much heavier than the TruGlu I replaced it with. After mounting I had to shoot numerous arrows to dial it in at 20 yards. Once I had the retina lock dialed in which was time consuming I found it to be more of a distraction than a help. With that being said I removed it from my bow and am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I know I am probably the only one in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I know I am probably the only one in the world still shooting a finger bow so may not apply to anyone else but the sight didn't fit my older finger bow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this bow site
customer_reviews.text: The IQ sight was super simple to sight in and I have been shooting much tighter groups because of the retina lock feature. Now I need the light accessory.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A. Lauer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Works better then expected. Micro adjustments are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hafenbreadl

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sights retina adjustment are not to great not fine enough
customer_reviews.author: Bridgett denise bowling

customer_reviews.title: Nice sight just not the one pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Great sight, easy to sight in. Only reason for one star is the picture shows the all black sight and I received the black and green one.
customer_reviews.author: Rory Elinkowski

product_meta.title: IQ Bowsight Micro 3 or 5 Pin Compound Bow Archery Sight with Retina Lock Technology - Left and Right Hand
product_meta.description: The NEW IQ MICRO BOWSIGHT offers RETINA LOCK TECHNOLOGY which provides instant feedback that will identify even the slightest torque or anchor point change. Micro adjustment knobs that allow quick and simple adjustment of the elevation and windage to precise positions. Dual position mounting gives you the ability to mount your sight to your particular shooting style. Tool-free locking knobs allow you to lock your windage and elevation positions in place without the use of any tools.
feature_bullets: RETINA LOCK TECHNOLOGY - Controls muscle memory, form and consistency, allowing you to shoot longer distances with tighter groups. Provides instant feedback that will identify the slightest torque or anchor point change

MICRO ADJUST KNOBS - Allowing quick and simple adjustment of the elevation and windage to precise positions using the adjustment markings. The TOOL FREE LOCKING KNOBS lock your windage and elevation in place
LEFT HAND, 3 PINS - .019 Fiber Optic Pins. Stack tight pins, built-in sight level
DUAL POSITION MOUNT - Gives you the ability to mount your sight to your particular shooting style
ADJUSTABLE 2nd AXIS - Rheostat Sight Light accessory S15000 (sold separately). IQ Micro Bowsight Weighs 7.4 oz.
